artifacts.content:
{
  "mvp_definition": {
    "core_value_proposition": "A comprehensive build monitoring and visibility dashboard for OLYMPUS developers",
    "target_user": "OLYMPUS developers and power users who need real-time insight into their builds",
    "key_differentiator": "Provides a single pane of glass for understanding the entire build process, from planning to deployment"
  },
  "mvp_features": [
    {
      "id": "build_list",
      "name": "Build List",
      "category": "core",
      "priority": "must_have",
      "rice_score": 95,
      "rice_breakdown": {
        "reach": 10,
        "impact": 10,
        "confidence": 10,
        "effort": 7
      },
      "description": "Displays a list of all active and completed builds, with status indicators, timestamps, and duration",
      "user_story": "As an OLYMPUS developer, I want to see a list of all my builds so that I can monitor their progress and identify any issues"
    },
    {
      "id": "phase_progression",
      "name": "Phase Progression",
      "category": "core",
      "priority": "must_have",
      "rice_score": 92,
      "rice_breakdown": {
        "reach": 9,
        "impact": 10,
        "confidence": 9,
        "effort": 8
      },
      "description": "Provides a visual timeline of the build process, showing the status of each phase (discovery, design, architecture, etc.)",
      "user_story": "As an OLYMPUS developer, I want to see the progress of my build through the different phases so that I can understand where it is in the process and identify any bottlenecks"
    },
    {
      "id": "agent_roster",
      "name": "Agent Roster",
      "category": "core",
      "priority": "must_have",
      "rice_score": 90,
      "rice_breakdown": {
        "reach": 8,
        "impact": 9,
        "confidence": 9,
        "effort": 8
      },
      "description": "Displays a list of all 35 agents involved in the build process, their roles, and their current status",
      "user_story": "As an OLYMPUS developer, I want to see who is working on my build and what they are doing so that I can understand the overall process and identify any issues with individual agents"
    },
    {
      "id": "constitutional_status",
      "name": "Constitutional Status",
      "category": "core",
      "priority": "must_have",
      "rice_score": 88,
      "rice_breakdown": {
        "reach": 8,
        "impact": 9,
        "confidence": 8,
        "effort": 9
      },
      "description": "Provides a traffic light system to indicate the status of key constitutional checks, with explanations for each",
      "user_story": "As an OLYMPUS developer, I want to know if my build is compliant with the OLYMPUS constitution so that I can address any issues before deployment"
    },
    {
      "id": "understanding_panel",
      "name": "Understanding Your Build",
      "category": "core",
      "priority": "must_have",
      "rice_score": 85,
      "rice_breakdown": {
        "reach": 8,
        "impact": 8,
        "confidence": 8,
        "effort": 9
      },
      "description": "Provides information about what was built, why it was built that way, and any known risks",
      "user_story": "As an OLYMPUS developer, I want to understand the reasoning behind the decisions made during my build so that I can make more informed choices in the future"
    },
    {
      "id": "contextual_chat",
      "name": "Contextual Chat",
      "category": "supporting",
      "priority": "should_have",
      "rice_score": 75,
      "rice_breakdown": {
        "reach": 7,
        "impact": 7,
        "confidence": 8,
        "effort": 8
      },
      "description": "Allows developers to ask questions about the current build in a contextual chat panel",
      "user_story": "As an OLYMPUS developer, I want to be able to ask questions about my build and get answers from the relevant agents, so that I can better understand the process and make more informed decisions"
    }
  ],
  "roadmap": {
    "phase_1_mvp": {
      "duration": "4-6 weeks",
      "features": [
        "build_list",
        "phase_progression",
        "agent_roster",
        "constitutional_status",
        "understanding_panel"
      ],
      "milestone": "Comprehensive build monitoring and visibility"
    },
    "phase_2_enhance": {
      "duration": "2-4 weeks",
      "features": [
        "contextual_chat"
      ],
      "milestone": "Improved collaboration and understanding"
    },
    "phase_3_scale": {
      "duration": "ongoing",
      "features": [],
      "milestone": "Continuous improvement and expansion"
    }
  },
  "technical_requirements": {
    "stack": {
      "frontend": "Next.js 14 + React 18 + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS",
      "backend": "Next.js API Routes",
      "database": "No database required (read-only)"
    },
    "integrations": [
      "OLYMPUS /api/builds endpoint",
      "OLYMPUS /api/ai/agents endpoint"
    ],
    "performance": {
      "initial_load": "<3s",
      "interaction_response": "<500ms",
      "lighthouse_target": ">90"
    },
    "security": [
      "HTTPS",
      "JWT token authentication"
    ]
  },
  "success_criteria": {
    "launch_requirements": [
      "All critical features functional",
      "No TypeScript errors",
      "Responsive on desktop",
      "Core user flows completable end-to-end"
    ],
    "validation_metrics": [
      "Users can navigate the build process in under 2 minutes",
      "Zero critical bugs in core flows",
      "Positive user feedback on build visibility and understanding"
    ]
  },
  "featureChecklist": {
    "critical": [
      {
        "id": "build_list",
        "name": "Build List",
        "description": "Displays a list of all active and completed builds, with status indicators, timestamps, and duration",
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Displays a table with columns for build status, start time, end time, and duration",
          "Status indicators show queued, running, completed, and failed builds",
          "Clicking on a build row navigates to the build detail page",
          "No hardcoded data - fetches data from /api/builds endpoint",
          "Displays up to 50 builds, with pagination controls"
        ],
        "assignedTo": "pixel",
        "priority": 1,
        "rice_score": 95
      },
      {
        "id": "phase_progression",
        "name": "Phase Progression",
        "description": "Provides a visual timeline of the build process, showing the status of each phase",
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Displays a horizontal timeline with the following phases: discovery, design, architecture, frontend, backend, integration, testing, deployment",
          "Each phase shows its status (pending, active, completed, failed) and a brief description",
          "Phases are color-coded using the traffic light system (green, yellow, red)",
          "Clicking on a phase shows more details about that phase",
          "Timeline updates in real-time using the /api/builds/[buildId]/stream endpoint"
        ],
        "assignedTo": "pixel",
        "priority": 2,
        "rice_score": 92
      },
      {
        "id": "agent_roster",
        "name": "Agent Roster",
        "description": "Displays a list of all 35 agents involved in the build process, their roles, and their current status",
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Displays a table with columns for agent name, role, status (idle, working, completed, failed), and current task",
          "Agents are grouped by build phase (discovery, design, etc.)",
          "Agent status is updated in real-time using the /api/ai/agents endpoint",
          "Clicking on an agent shows more details about their role and responsibilities"
        ],
        "assignedTo": "pixel",
        "priority": 3,
        "rice_score": 90
      },
      {
        "id": "constitutional_status",
        "name": "Constitutional Status",
        "description": "Provides a traffic light system to indicate the status of key constitutional checks, with explanations for each",
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Displays a panel with up to 7 constitutional checks, each with a traffic light indicator (green, yellow, red)",
          "Each check has a name, status, and a one-sentence explanation",
          "Checks are based on the provided list of constitutional articles",
          "Status is fetched from the /api/builds/[buildId] endpoint and updates in real-time"
        ],
        "assignedTo": "pixel",
        "priority": 4,
        "rice_score": 88
      },
      {
        "id": "understanding_panel",
        "name": "Understanding Your Build",
        "description": "Provides information about what was built, why it was built that way, and any known risks",
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Displays a panel with three sections: 'What was built', 'Why it was built this way', and 'Known risks'",
          "'What was built' lists the generated components and files",
          "'Why it was built this way' explains the key decisions and reasoning",
          "'Known risks' outlines identified risks and their mitigation status",
          "Information is fetched from the /api/builds/[buildId] endpoint"
        ],
        "assignedTo": "pixel",
        "priority": 5,
        "rice_score": 85
      }
    ],
    "important": [
      {
        "id": "contextual_chat",
        "name": "Contextual Chat",
        "description": "Allows developers to ask questions about the current build in a contextual chat panel",
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Displays a collapsible chat panel on the right side of the screen",
          "Chat panel is only visible when a build is selected",
          "Users can type questions and send them to the relevant agents",
          "Agents' responses are displayed in the chat panel",
          "Chat history is persisted for the current build session"
        ],
        "assignedTo": "pixel",
        "priority": 6,
        "rice_score": 75
      }
    ],
    "niceToHave": []
  },
  "risks": [
    {
      "risk": "Integrating with multiple OLYMPUS APIs (builds, agents) may introduce complexity and potential reliability issues",
      "probability": "medium",
      "impact": "medium",
      "mitigation": "Implement robust error handling and fallback mechanisms, monitor API response times and reliability"
    },
    {
      "risk": "Displaying a large number of builds and agents may impact performance and user experience",
      "probability": "medium",
      "impact": "medium",
      "mitigation": "Implement pagination, infinite scrolling, and lazy loading techniques to optimize performance"
    },
    {
      "risk": "Interpreting and displaying the constitutional status may be subjective and require close collaboration with the OLYMPUS legal team",
      "probability": "medium",
      "impact": "high",
      "mitigation": "Work closely with the OLYMPUS legal team to define clear and objective criteria for the constitutional checks"
    }
  ]
}
